question: What is SheaBot?
answer: SheaBot is an advanced AI chat application that combines the power of OpenAI's GPT-4o and Google's Gemini Flash. It features a RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) system to provide accurate information based on your FAQ documents.

question: How do I switch between AI models?
answer: You can switch between OpenAI and Gemini using the toggles located just above the message input field in the chat interface.

question: How do I reset my password?
answer: Click on 'Forgot password?' on the login screen. Enter your email address, and we'll send you a reset link. If you're already logged in, you can find this option in your account settings.

question: Is my chat history saved?
answer: Yes, all your conversations are saved to your account. You can access them from the sidebar on the left side of the chat interface.

question: Can I edit or delete my messages?
answer: Yes! Hover over any message you've sent to see the edit (pencil) and delete (trash) icons. Currently, only user messages can be edited.
